name: Sol (Adin3)
description:
Hybrid between bullet hell and rhythm game genre.

Made for the OLC CodeJam 2022

Controls

-movement-

D - left

F - middle left

J - middle right

K - right

-action-

Enter - interact/continue

Space - God Mode (Invincibility)

The game was meant to be played without God Mode

read the README.txt file for more info
